channel.title: DevilsScape
channel.description:
[SIZE=3]That's Right guys, classic DevilsScape is back!!![/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Desktop Client: [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/65718719/client.jar"]Desktop Client[/URL][/SIZE] [SIZE=4]Webclient: [url=http://devilsscape.x10.mx/webclient.php]DevilsScape Webclient[/url][/SIZE] [SIZE=4]Forums: [url=http://devilsscape.x10.mx/forum]DevilsScape Forums[/url][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]MY INGAME NAME IS NEO.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]i have been working on RSPS for a while now and the 562 protocol has always been my favorite. I was thinking of revolutionizing 562 servers since there aren't many more of them. [/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Current Developers: Only me at the moment. Looking for beta testers and or coding partners![/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Credits: Me[/SIZE].
[spoiler=Updates][SIZE=3]04/26/2013: Started again on this project; V2. Also fixed a few bugs involving money pouch.
05/05/2013: Money Vault, which you can withdraw coins or deposit coins from. Kind of like Money pouch, but a good alternative.
05/06/2013: Added DevilsScape Manager which helps you change your password, set recoveries, set a title or yell title, open your money vault, or reset skills. More options to come.
05/10/2013: XP Counter is now available for use. Can also reset XP gained by simply typing in the command ::resetxp.
05/15/2013: I have again started on this project after the release of my V2 source.
05/20/2013: Fixed up titles, made it more complicated XD
05/26/2013: Added Individual Player Ranks. Every player has a rank to start out with: Recruit and builds up on that. Max Number of ranks at the moment: 50 [/SIZE][/spoiler]
[spoiler=Things done][COLOR="#000080"][SIZE=4]Mini Boss Pets All Skills work (May not function exactly like Real RS) Money Pouch Renders Correct NPC facing NPC smart and dumb walking Gangs Private Messaging system alternative Nex Torva HP Boosting NPC vs. NPC No Lag 100% Gambler with random percentage of winning DevilsScape Manager(does all sorts of things) Titles and Loyalty Titles Display Name System Yell Title Changing XP Counter (Custom) Money Vault Correct Dialogues Completely Re-done dialogue handling method 1 Click NPC interaction 1 Click Attacking Shops Custom Renders Custom Items Custom NPCs Minigames Bosses Lucifer Boss Polypore Ganodermic Random Events Thieving Woodcutting Torva Virtus Pernix Completionist Cape Christmas Event Auto Donation Support Vote4Cash Support Zombies Dragon Minigame PVP armour Minigame Duel Arena Corporeal beast Jad Force walking Nex NPC Teleporting Siri Awesome way to get food - I wanna buy food ;) Hangman Cleaner Command Handling "Pokemon Encountering" NPCs Saveable by command Outfit saving A LOT More To be Posted..[/SIZE] [/COLOR][/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5gZySiy.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/v0jta3k.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C0xBO7F.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y3bNtlJ.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eY9ueT4.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6VED4D4.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/umSUuzp.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0Bgfn3D.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f2oQdFH.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Lblf06v.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FSIFBHz.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dLt69yU.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GGRK3qd.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/im4Yaot.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j8PR5zv.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AdvMOj3.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/STf3pJk.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R5B60mW.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g9T7eAn.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IHkaaEZ.png?1[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: DevilsScape
item.dc:creator: @Revamp_dis_Shit Revamp dis Shit
item.description:
@Revamp_dis_Shit wrote:

Too many crowns and colors in chat!!! :palm:
Gl with this though.

item.title: DevilsScape
item.dc:creator: @Lucifer667 Lucifer667
item.description:
@Lucifer667 wrote:

[SIZE=3]That’s Right guys, classic DevilsScape is back!!![/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Desktop Client: [URL=http://“https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/65718719/client.jar”]Desktop Client[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Webclient: DevilsScape Webclient[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]Forums: DevilsScape Forums[/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]MY INGAME NAME IS NEO.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]i have been working on RSPS for a while now and the 562 protocol has always been my favorite. I was thinking of revolutionizing 562 servers since there aren’t many more of them. [/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Current Developers: Only me at the moment. Looking for beta testers and or coding partners![/SIZE]

[SIZE=4]Credits: Me[/SIZE].

[spoiler=Updates][SIZE=3]04/26/2013: Started again on this project; V2. Also fixed a few bugs involving money pouch.

05/05/2013: Money Vault, which you can withdraw coins or deposit coins from. Kind of like Money pouch, but a good alternative.

05/06/2013: Added DevilsScape Manager which helps you change your password, set recoveries, set a title or yell title, open your money vault, or reset skills. More options to come.

05/10/2013: XP Counter is now available for use. Can also reset XP gained by simply typing in the command ::resetxp.

05/15/2013: I have again started on this project after the release of my V2 source.

05/20/2013: Fixed up titles, made it more complicated XD

05/26/2013: Added Individual Player Ranks. Every player has a rank to start out with: Recruit and builds up on that. Max Number of ranks at the moment: 50
[/SIZE][/spoiler]

[spoiler=Things done][COLOR="#000080"][SIZE=4]Mini Boss Pets
All Skills work (May not function exactly like Real RS)
Money Pouch
Renders
Correct NPC facing
NPC smart and dumb walking
Gangs
Private Messaging system alternative
Nex
Torva HP Boosting
NPC vs. NPC
No Lag
100% Gambler with random percentage of winning
DevilsScape Manager(does all sorts of things)
Titles and Loyalty Titles
Display Name System
Yell Title Changing
XP Counter (Custom)
Money Vault
Correct Dialogues
Completely Re-done dialogue handling method
1 Click NPC interaction
1 Click Attacking
Shops
Custom Renders
Custom Items
Custom NPCs
Minigames
Bosses
Lucifer Boss
Polypore
Ganodermic
Random Events
Thieving
Woodcutting
Torva Virtus Pernix
Completionist Cape
Christmas Event
Auto Donation Support
Vote4Cash Support
Zombies
Dragon Minigame
PVP armour Minigame
Duel Arena
Corporeal beast
Jad
Force walking
Nex
NPC Teleporting
Siri
Awesome way to get food - I wanna buy food
Hangman
Cleaner Command Handling
"Pokemon Encountering"
NPCs Saveable by command
Outfit saving
A LOT More To be Posted…[/SIZE]
[/COLOR][/spoiler]
